definitions.definition: To perform or speak without prior planning or thought ; to act in an impromptu manner; to improvise .
To adapt , improvise, or devise action or speech in an impromptu or spontaneous manner.

main_definition: ( intransitive ) To perform or speak without prior planning or thought ; to act in an impromptu manner; to improvise .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To adapt , improvise, or devise action or speech in an impromptu or spontaneous manner.
